item.title: Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services 2.2.0 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services 2.2.0 Please welcome a new release of Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services V2.2.0. Major Features Other Improvements and Changes (SSRS-40164) Fit to Page feature for exporting Excel report Bugs (SSRS-40204) Export from SSRS is taking very long and returning an error (SSRS-40202) Export to Excel Error - same worksheet name already exists (SSRS-40201) After setting HisOption as 2 then clicking the cell ignores the rs:Format parameter when opening the hyperlink into the browser
